title: E281 A Gossip Corner Dinner Trap and Facts Served Up on a Celery Dish
description: It's episode 281 and celery vases are so out but celery plates are in! First Em dishes it out with their story on the Emlen Physick Estate in Cape May, adding a personal twist as well as a deep dive into the history of the high end Victorian celery market. Then Christine covers the notorious cold case, the Springfield Three. And if anyone has a lead on a celery vase from the Titanic, please hit us up... and that's why we drink!
author: andthatswhywedrink@gmail.com (Em Schulz, Christine Schiefer, Eva Gross)
